action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Chemistry
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Two years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Master
OTHER-SKILLS: Spanish
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about the field of my bachelor's degree in Chemistry.
NA

probes.question: ME: Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about the field of my bachelor's degree in Chemistry.

probes.question: ME: Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: No, the recruiter has not been informed about my time of industry experience.

probes.question: ME: Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, I believe the recruiter is aware of my latest academic level, which is a Master's degree in Chemistry.

probes.question: ME: Is the recruiter aware of your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: No, the recruiter is not aware of my other skills.

probes.question: ME: Have you informed the interviewer about your dates? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: No, I have not informed the interviewer about my availability yet. (ASIDE: I was planning to bring it up during the interview, but since you asked, yes, I am available in two weeks' time.)
